entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Editors not scrollable on iOS/Catalyst #12485
  • EXC_BAD_ACCESS (SIGKILL (Code Signature Invalid)) - App crashes when starting #12483
  • Display issues on MacCatalyst when multiple shell content is present inside a tab #12479
  • ShellContent.IsEnabled = false #12478
  • PlatformStringSizeService issues #12476
  • Blazor Maui Listening on public port, access is denied #12475
  • OData.Client throws ArgumentException #12474
  • ControlTemplate not propagating the BindingContext correctly #12470
  • RefreshView.IsRefreshing doesn't work with OneWay bindings #12469
    Backlog
  • IValueConverter is continuously triggering for TextColor property of Label while implicit style is applied #12465
    Backlog
  • NullReferenceException in `ShellToolbarAppearanceTracker.SetColors` on Android #12460
    Backlog
  • WSA or Android Emulator fails to render BindableLayouts content, although in Windows everything is fine #12459
  • Editor "layout" on windows is strange and flickers #12458
    Backlog

Closed

  • [Android] Bad z-index for item in a grid #9009
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Japanese Hiragana to Kanji converting not works in Searchbar Android #10683
    Backlog
  • Searchbar keyboard is switching back to alphabet characters immediately after entering one numeric character #9594
    Backlog
  • Version conflict detected for `Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.Abstractions` [NU1107] #12463
  • Local build does not work for .NET 7 #12464
  • [Bug] iOS: CollectionView items don't change their size when item content size is changed #3643
    .NET 7 + Servicing
  • Unable to load Win2D Maui Graphics images on the background thread #12370
    Backlog
  • CollectionView unusable on iPhone 14 Pro and iPhone 14 Pro Max #12221
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix winui titleview measure #12484
  • Generate everything splash related in the splash target #12481
  • - Simplify and fix flyout offset measurements #12480
  • [net7.0] Use older versions to match msbuild in VS #12472
    area/single project ☝️
  • Bump Castle.Core from 5.1.0 to 5.1.1 #12466
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget

Merged

  • Remove old versions from bug template #12412
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Use an older version of Json to match VS #12471
    area/single project ☝️
  • [release/6.0.5xx-sr9] [net6.0] Updating Windows App SDK version to 1.1.5 #12482
  • Give fallback width/height for Shapes prior to layout #12356
    area/drawing ✏️
  • [net6.0] Updating Windows App SDK version to 1.1.5 #12456
    area/infrastructure 🏗️, community ✨
  • Address Android SearchBar keyboard issue relating to TextTransform #11981
    area/controls 🎮
  • [release/7.0.1xx-sr2] Use an older version of Json to match VS #12473
  • [net7.0] Update Essentials Gyroscope API Docs #12448
    area/docs 📓
  • Use the correct property when asking the UICollectionViewLayout to update #12457
  • Ensure image creation on any thread #12418
    area/drawing ✏️

Updated

  • Make MAUI into 1 workload and lots of NuGets instead of a full workload #11206
    area/setup 🪄
  • Toggle IsEnabled on Layout children when IsEnabled changes #12365
    area/layout 🔲
  • [net7.0] [Tizen] Add missing Shell features in Tizen #12157
    area/shell 🐢, community ✨, platform/tizen
  • Fix timing on iOS Toolbar #12363
    area/shell 🐢, area/toolbar
  • Use darc to get feeds for dependencies of build #11487
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Fix Secondary Tap Scenarios on Android #10619
  • Unseal some Microsoft.Maui.Controls classes #12451
    area/architecture, community ✨
  • Feat: Added "Keyboard.None" #11024
    area/controls 🎮, community ✨
